name: Zombie Arcade
description:
Zombie Arcade is a small 3D top-down arcade style shooter.

Survive by shooting the Zombies (Red Cubes) and picking up new weapons.
The waves get progressively harder as you play.

There are currently five different weapons.
  1. Basic Laser - Red
  2. Adv Laser - Blue
  3. Blast Laser - Yellow
  4. Lightning Rod - Purple and Yellow
  5. Ice Rod - White and Blue

Each weapons has different traits.

-- Controls --

Movement: wasd / arrow keys

Shooting: Left mouse button

Drop bomb: Space

Activate bomb: Right mouse button
